name: Hand Hammer
description: An oval-shaped hole is made in the body in which the handle is fitted by using a wedge.

name: Ball Peen Hammer
description: On one end of this ball pane hammer, a plain face is made and on the other end, a pane of 3/4 like a round ball is made.

name: Sledge Hammer
description: These are mostly used in blacksmithy for straightening round rods, iron bars, angle iron, channel, or flat iron.

name: Claw Hammer
description: These are special types of hammers. On one end of this hammer, a round face is made and on the other end, its pane is inclined towards the handle.

name: Club Hammer
description: If compared to as a drilling hammer or lump hammer, the tool has a small, double-faced head that is similar to a sledgehammer.
